description: Sharing is caring: that’s a lesson Jake Andrews wants to demonstrate to Rafael Lords. The couple gets frisky on their bed when their housemate Ashton Summers “accidentally” stumbles across their fun. (Jake is performing oral sex on Rafael, so of course Ashton is going to be intrigued upon his intrusion.) Why be prudes when it’s far better to have an extra body to throw around? One of the best portions of this encounter can be found at 27:10 when Rafael is being split-roasted: Jake is giving him deep and rhythmic thrusts while he swallows Ashton’s cock!
title: Jake Andrews Shares Rafael Lords With Ashton Summers
